message: You just found your Holomap! To use it, look at the inventory by pressing <SHIFT> or simply press <TAB>.
You just found your Magic Ball! When you wear your ancestral Tunic you'll be able to bounce it at your enemies!
You have found three darts.
You just found Sendell's Ball. Now you have reached a new level of magic: Red Ball. It will also enable Sendell to contact you in case of danger.
You have just found your ancestral Tunic and Sendell's Medallion. By storing Magic, it will enable you to bounce your ball at your enemies.
You just found the Pearl of Incandescent. These Pearls are highly prized by magicians. They will enable you to complete a spell.
Your neighbor just gave you a pyramid shaped key.
Jerome Baldino just gave you a part that Zo√© needs to fix the car.
Empty
You have found a laser-pistol. It needs a rock crystal to work properly.
You just seized the emperor's sword. Now you can face the hussars guarding the Emperor's palace.
You just found a Wannie's Glove. Use it to repell the fireballs your enemies throw at you.
You just found the Proto-Pack. Put it on and you'll fly a few inches above the ground.
You have a ferry ticket.
You just acquired a superb Nitro-Meca-Penguin. Select it in the inventory and it'll explode a few seconds later.
You just found a can of Gazogem. This fuel will allow you to get your new super jet-pack.
You just found the Ring of Dissidents. It's their identification sign, and it will allow you to be identified by all the dissidents that you meet.
You just found a flask of gallic acid. It's often used to restore ancient documents.
You just learned the ferryman's song. It will help you to get to Mosquibee Island.
You just found the customer's umbrella
You just picked up a gem.
You own the Horn of the Blue Triton, you can use it to heal yourself or someone else.
You now have a blowgun. It fires darts fast and accurately.
You have found a itinary token. You can now use an Esmer shuttle.
You just found a slice of tart!
You now own a portable radio. You can now receive calls from your friends.
You just picked a Garden Balsam plant.
You now own a Magic Slate, which allows you to keep a copy of all kinds of images.
You have found a translator. Now you'll be able to understand the Esmer language.
You just received your wizard's diploma. Plus you just earned a new level of magic: Green Ball.
You now own the Francos key fragment.
You now own the Sups key fragment.
You now own the Mosquibees key fragment.
You now own the Wannies key fragment.
You just found the key of the passage which leads to island CX.
You just bought a pick-ax. Use it to dig or detach rocks and pieces of crystal.
You just found the Francos Burgermaster's key.
You just found the Francos Burgermaster's notes. They'll help you find the Francos fragment.
You now own a protective spell.
You now own the key to Dark Monk's temple. Plus you just reached your last level of magic: Fire Ball.
You just found a memory viewer.
You just found the blowtron. Use it to shoot faster and more powerfully.
You just found a parade outfit for the wizards. It'll make you look like an old wizard.
Jerome just gave you the super-jetpack. It will allow you to reach places you couldn't get to using the proto-pack.
You just found a piece of the Crystal of Celebration. Now you can reload your laser-pistol.
You now own a laser-pistol in working condition. It gives you enough firepower to reach distant targets that your magical ball cannot reach..
You just found the Ring of Lightning! Use it to find Sendell's Ball.

Lucky Clover Leaf

The Holomap is a 3-D map system. You may use several zoom factors to determine your position on the planet. There are also arrows which can point to the location of tasks to be accomplished, after some characters have given you certain information.
You can throw the Magic Ball and make it bounce in different ways: For that, you need the Tunic since it allows you to store Magic power that the Ball consumes at each throw.
You can throw these darts at any time by selecting them in the inventory. To retrieve them, you only have to touch them.
Thanks to Sendell's Ball, you just reached your third level of magic: red ball. With its help, Sendell can come and talk to you in case of danger.

This Tunic, bequeathed by your ancestors, will help you store Magic power. Some is consumed each time you use a magical object, such as your ball. In order to use them, you must find enough Magic and carry it with you.
By dipping this pearl in the Weather Wizard's cauldron, you will be able to create a ring of lightning.
This Pyramid is a key. If you put it in the right place, it will activate a mechanism giving you access to a secret place.
After a few adjustmenta and once Zo√© fits the part, the car will be ready to go.
It is the exchange currency of your planet Twinsun. It allows you to buy the articles you are interested in.
This gun shoots straight, far reaching rays. But, after each use, it needs some time to reload.
With the emperor's sword, you can now face the hussars of the imperial guard.
With this Wannie's glove, you can now touch the fire. This will allow you to throw back the fire balls that the monsters from the gas hurl at you.
It was designed by Jerome Baldino. In order to fly above water, you must approach at a low angle. Otherwise, you will sink with your Proto-Pack.
This ticket allows you to travel aboard the ferry which links Citadel Island and White Leaf Desert Island.
You can use the Nitro-Meca-Penguins by placing them in a level and unencumbered area.
After you give it to Jerome, this can of gazogem will allow your friend to turn your proto-pack into a super-jetpack.
This ring is made and worn only by the dissidents. It is their identification sign. It will allow you to be recognized as one of them and to make contact with them.
Gallic acid is used to restore ancient documents. It allows you to brighten up the areas where the ink has faded.
If you sing it at the end of the ferryman's wharf, you will see him emerge from the mist and come to offer to take you to another island.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
This umbrella belongs to a pharmacy customer.
The gems are commonly used by the Francos to produce gazogem. But you can use it to pay for the ferryman's services.
It lets you draw in hearts (Life points) and store them. You can then use them to treat yourself or someone else.
The Blowgun provides rapid firepower. You can reload it with small projectiles, such as berries.
The travel token allows to program the destination of an Esmer shuttle. Without it, the spacecraft cannot take off.
You don't like this tart, but you must give this slice to someone who appreciates it more than you.
This portable radio allows you to dialogue with Baldino and Zo√© when they are listening and if they are not out of range.
You must bring this flower to the Rector of the School of Magic.

By using the Action command in front of a plan, a print or any other illustration, you immediately create a copy with the Magic Slate. You can consult it at any time by selecting the Slate in the inventory.
This translator allows you to understand everything said by the visitors from Space. In discreet mode, you can even spy on conversations.
Your diploma in magic has allowed you to reach the green ball level of magic.
This fragment of the Francos' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This fragment of the Sups' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This fragment of the Mosquibees' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This fragment of the Wannies' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This key will allow you to open the doors of the passage, whose entrance is in the village of the Mosquibees, and which will allow you to go up to islet CX.
This pick-ax will allow you to dig into the ground or harder materials. With it, you can now locate objects buried underground, or extract materials.
It is the key that the burgermaster lost before he was eaten by a monster from the gas. Nobody has ever used it since.
These notes contain the enigma which leads to the fragment of the Francos. They give a clue to the location where the fragment was buried is revealed.

This Tunic, bequeathed by your ancestors, now gives you protection besides storing Magic. To use the shielding spell, press Enter from the Inventory. This spell consumes some Magic, just like throwing the Ball and using several other magic objects.
You can throw the Magic Ball and have it bounce in many different ways. The green ball level allows you to inflict more damage upon your enemies.
You can throw the Magic Ball and have it bounce in many different ways. The red ball level allows you to inflict more damage upon your enemies.
You can throw the Magic Ball and have it bounce in many different ways. The fire ball level allows you to inflict more damage upon your enemies.
It is the exchange currency of planet Zeelich. With it, you can buy the articles you are interested in on planet Zeelich.

Once the four fragments are reunited, you will have the key to Dark Monk's temple. According to the prophecy, it will allow you to make the statue come out of the volcano's crater, and to open the doors of the temple built in it.
The memory viewer allows you to review the sequences which have punctuated your adventure.
With the blowtron, you now dispose of a much higher firing rate.
This parade outfit is accessible only to Twinsun's graduated wizards. It makes of you a bona fide magician.
It was put together by Jerome Baldino. It allows now you to access new locations and to follow some grades that were impracticable with the proto-pack.
This piece of the Crystal of Celebration is of unmatched purity. It will allow you to operate a pisto-Laser.
This pisto-Laser shoots horizontal rays. They will allow you to hit enemies who are at a great distance.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
This Lucky Clover Leaf gives you the benefit of an additional life.

Elevator to the under-gas.
Under Celebration.

With my eyes focused on the center of the bazaar, my back is glued to a natural parasol where I'd love to take a nap, but I must keep a sportive mood. It seems there are enough light posts and arches in the village to count the correct number of steps. Once there, the fences to my left point in the wrong direction. It's on the other side, down in the basin near the gas that my buried treasure lies.
An action/adventure game on PC CD_ROM SVGA/DirectDraw graphics
Detail-packed 3D isometric interior rendering mode.
Revolutionary true 3D texture-mapped exterior rendering mode.
Explore over 220 places on 3 different planets.
Meet over 300 fascinating characters.
Incredibly smooth real-time animation with texture mapping and lighting.
15 minutes of stunning movie sequences.
Thousands of stereo sound effects and two and a half hours of spoken dialogue.
Voices in French, English and German. (Subtitles in French, English, German, Italian and Spanish).
30 minutes of soft, enchanting music.
Laughter all the way in this storyline that will keep you amused for more than 60 hours of play.
